thread.title: Putin seeks end to Skripal row at chemical watchdog meeting

title: Putin seeks end to Skripal row at chemical watchdog meeting
text:
Putin seeks end to Skripal row at chemical watchdog meeting 9:41am BST - 01:32 
The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons will hold a special session on Wednesday, at Moscow's request, into the poisoning of former Russian double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter Yulia in the British city of Salisbury.   
The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons will hold a special session on Wednesday, at Moscow's request, into the poisoning of former Russian double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter Yulia in the British city of Salisbury.  //reut.rs/2q5LOZt
